name: .MTF File Extension
summary: Learn about .MTF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Audio file used by Mult Tracker, a program that allows musicians to play songs by removing vocals or instruments; saves a "backing track," which is a remake of an existing song that splits different musical parts across multiple tracks.

content: When playing an MTF file, users can adjust the volume of instruments and vocals individually.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
